SEARCH
Package com.flipkart.dao

Interface ProfDaoInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
ProfDaoServices
public interface ProfDaoInterface
Interface for professor data access object (DAO) operations. Provides methods for professors to manage course offerings and grades.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    Set<Student>
    getStudents(String courseID, Prof prof)
    Retrieves the list of students registered for a specific course.
    boolean
    giveGrade(String courseID, String studentID, String grade, Prof prof)
    Allows a professor to give a grade to a student for a specific course.
    boolean
    offerCourse(String courseID, Prof prof)
    Allows a professor to offer a course.
    Set<Course>
    viewCourseOffering(Prof prof)
    Retrieves the list of courses currently being offered by a specific professor.
    Set<Course>
    viewCourses()
    Retrieves the list of all available courses.

  • Method Details

    • offerCourse

      boolean offerCourse(String courseID, Prof prof) throws CourseNotAvailableException
      Allows a professor to offer a course.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the course to be offered.
      prof - The `Prof` object representing the professor offering the course.
      Returns:
      `true` if the course was successfully offered; `false` otherwise.
      Throws:
      CourseNotAvailableException - If the course with the given ID is not available in the catalog.

    • viewCourses

      Set<Course> viewCourses()
      Retrieves the list of all available courses.
      Returns:
      A `Set` containing all the courses available.

    • getStudents

      Set<Student> getStudents(String courseID, Prof prof)
      Retrieves the list of students registered for a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the course whose students are to be retrieved.
      prof - The `Prof` object representing the professor requesting the student list.
      Returns:
      A `Set` containing students registered for the specified course.

    • giveGrade

      boolean giveGrade(String courseID, String studentID, String grade, Prof prof) throws CourseNotOptedException, GradeAlreadyAddedException, CourseNotOfferedException
      Allows a professor to give a grade to a student for a specific course.
      Parameters:
      courseID - The ID of the course for which the grade is being given.
      studentID - The ID of the student receiving the grade.
      grade - The grade to be given to the student.
      prof - The `Prof` object representing the professor giving the grade.
      Returns:
      `true` if the grade was successfully added; `false` otherwise.
      Throws:
      CourseNotOptedException - If the student has not opted for the given course.
      GradeAlreadyAddedException - If a grade has already been added for the student in the given course.
      CourseNotOfferedException - If the course is not offered by the professor.

    • viewCourseOffering

      Set<Course> viewCourseOffering(Prof prof)
      Retrieves the list of courses currently being offered by a specific professor.
      Parameters:
      prof - The `Prof` object representing the professor whose course offerings are to be retrieved.
      Returns:
      A `Set` containing the courses being offered by the specified professor.
